name: Genome-wide recombination rates
description: I developed an cost-efficient and simple approach to measure recombination rate at genome scale. This approach called marker selected pools takes advantage of allele frequency decay around a selected locus to infer chromosome-wide recombination rate. The recombination rate and genetic map of a chromosome can be determined in as little as one or two libraries!

name: Neo-Y evolution with male recombination
description: Drosophila albomicans has a pair of young neo-sex chromosomes. Surprisingly, the males of this species used to recombine. We explore the effects recombination has had on the neo-Y chromsome and the consequences after the males can no longer recombine.
